alert.note: Alert for Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 8:19PM CDT until April 06 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Yellow River at Necedah affecting Juneau County. .The combination of rainfall from Friday and snow melt will cause the Yellow River at Necedah, WI to rise above its 15 foot minor flood stage on Sunday evening. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING TO LATE THURSDAY EVENING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yellow River at Necedah. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to late Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.3 feet on 05/03/2014. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 1045 AM CDT.
